评论详情: For my height, you need to make additional holes, but it's not a big deal. A great addition to any look, the look immediately becomes more interesting. I liked it.
It fits well and looks stylish. I can't wait to go out like this 😀❤️

It’s pretty cheap material, but it was also cheap to purchase. After wearing once, the straps had a ton of wear and tear and the buckles were bent and nearly broken. Mostly this would be best as a one-time costume accessory (worn loosely) and not as a daily wear accessory.

评论概述: Adds an edgy vibe to any outfit
评论详情: It’s adjustable, comfortable, and perfect for gothic or punk inspired looks. Great statement piece for parties or photoshoots!

Bought this for my wife and she loved it. It fit her well, seems well made, and hits her style exactly as she wanted it.  It's nice that it can be worn comfortably over many types of clothing and it's worn nicely without. Is it the best you're ever going to get? No. But for the price? Yeah man, go for it.

I absolutely love this body chain! It adds the perfect punk vibe to any outfit, whether I’m dressing up for a night out or just adding some edge to casual wear.  The black leather feels sturdy and well-made, and it’s surprisingly comfortable to wear. Adjustable straps make it easy to fit just right. I’ve gotten so many compliments every time I wear it.

This harness belt is such a fun way to level up an outfit. The adjustable sizing is great because it actually fits comfortably without feeling too tight. The material feels durable but still soft enough to wear for hours. I’ve paired it with dresses and jeans, and it gives everything a little extra edge without trying too hard. Overall, it’s simple, stylish, and easy to work into any look.
They are good quality faux leather, it feel and smell almost like real leather. Love this simple harness. Very comfortable and easy to put on.

I was worried it wouldn't fit at first because I'm quite small, but I have to stress how important it is to read the size guides and information when getting these sorts of products and knowing your own measurements because it helps. However, I do have a belt hole puncher so I did have to take it in an inch but that was to be expected. It still looks great and after the minor adjustment, it fits great too!
I really love how this look, love the quality and fit perfect, I believe is a nice accessory to use.
Love it. Completed my look how i wanted

I really like the look and fit of the harness, and the leather is soft, but there are 0 directions on how to set it up and wear it. For the particular version I got, there isn't even pictures of the back, so good luck to all that order when you figure it out.
Fit well and nice design. My daughter selected this for an upcoming rock festival she is attending and she is very pleased with it.
Definitely perfect for you costumes in Halloween, it fits pretty well and the material looks resistant, it works for a normal day outfit too if you know how to style it.

评论概述: Nice leather harness for a good price
评论详情: This is a nice fashion piece to accessorize an outfit. The quality of the straps feels like leather and is durable. They initially feel stiff and rough, so I'm hoping they don't crack or break apart with more wear. So far, it holds together nicely. The buckles are functional, which helps adjust the sizing and fit. I'm not expecting a lifetime of wear for this price, but I think this will hold up, and it's a cool accessory to have in my styling arsenal.

I absolutely love the Ulekuke Punk Black Leather Body Harness Belt! It’s incredibly versatile and elevates every outfit I pair it with. Whether I’m going for a gothic look or just want to add some edge to a casual outfit, this harness does the trick. The adjustable waist belts ensure a perfect fit, and the quality of the leather is excellent. It’s become a staple in my wardrobe. Highly recommend this fashion accessory to anyone looking to make a bold statement!"

The belt is as beautiful as the picture and goes with almost any outfit I have. I really like it, I've been wearing it for half a month and the material of this harness belt is more durable! I'll recommend it to my friends.
I’ve worn this harness a couple of times now, and I absolutely love it! It’s great quality and is a perfect simple harness that compliments many outfits. Highly recommend!!
Wore this last night with a long, sheer black dress, with cool under layer and it was SO hot. I couldn't figure out how to make it look good with a shirt, but loving it with a dress.
Cute and simple to assemble harness! I am a bigger chested person and it fit perfectly over my chest. I like that it a simple style too.
Great quality material. Good for plus size girls as well , very comfortable.  Love the appearance it gives when dressing up.  Gotten many compliments!
Very cute can dress up or down great value
I got it as a surprise for my boyfriend. He loves it alot. its a bit confusing at first putting it on but otherwise no complaint
Got this for my costume. As expected!

There are plenty of buckle points on this harness. It definitely could pass as leather at a glance. It looks super cute on and is made well. The buckles work smoothly and a it has extra loops to hold the excess from adjusting the straps. Super cute!!!
Yeah, this is super cute. This is exactly what I wanted and it fits great. The straps are adjustable (of course) and it adds a punch of Vixen Vibes to any outfit.
Long dream to buy a harness and damn it was so cool. Value for the money

I got this because in the photos it says that is for a 26 to 41 " waist, but I don't think it is. I'm usually a L or XL to be more comfortable, and I know this is small, but since it gave those measurements I thought it would fit me, but it didn't. It fit my youngest kid with a 25" waist. So its for a small size person.

评论概述: Looks just like the photo. Would look great over a ren-faire dress too!
评论详情: Lovely. Fits well. Buckles are secure. Wouldn't grab and use it as a harness or anything- is aesthetic more than utilitarian. But- would look REALLY good over a simple Ren Faire dress. As long as you have a top on under it, the straps don't dig into the skin either.

This black body harness is made well and is true in size and is adjustable and you can add more holes with a leather punch if needed. It’s a little difficult to figure out how to put it on the body but it took me a minute to figure it out but eventually did after referencing it by the photos. The leather is durable and not too thick or thin and is comfortable to wear and looks exactly as pictured. I had a particular idea for this piece and not gothic. Yet used as a fashion piece for statement with a look I was going for and looks amazing and received so many compliments. Goes well with army cargo high waisted wide leg jeans and a button up long sleeve bodysuit and/or a button up shirt. Also keep in mind that this does bleed and may transfer color on lighter clothing. I am going to try and fix that issue and if I can remove some of the dye but I did have to condition the leather and soften and shine it up a bit. I highly recommend this piece if your into fashion or just want a grunge look. Decent leather but not the best but it is leather.
This is a cute harness that adjusts to accommodate many shapes and sizes.  I got this to wear to conventions and to spice up everyday outfits to make things more fun.  Great value for the price too.
The harness is exactly as pictured. It is a bit difficult to assemble but once you do, it is a good product to add for cosplay/costumes.

It took me a minute to figure out how to get it on but that's just me being new. Once I got it on and adjusted it was perfect! It fits great! It has lots of room for adjusting; all the straps are adjustable. It's very lightweight and very comfortable. The quality is amazing especially for the price!
Feels like a cheap cardboard Halloween costume, not great for wearing throughout the year. Picture was a little deceiving,  quality is pretty poor, returned.
Nice harness. Fits well and can be adjusted to many different sizes. Can be worn for a costume, cosplay, or just over a dress for a fun look.
Good PU leather material that feels like it could be leather. Easy to adjust to your size with the attached buckles & looks stylish on.

This product is what is it is. I feel like the overall is very straightforward. It is easy to adjust, and is overall comfortable. But I do have to say the “leather” isn’t that comfortable on the bare skin.
Great accessory to show the world that although you're only 16, you're somehow jaded and care-worn and willing to buck the stand sartorial expectations that society places on you.

Now I haven't really tested this in super revealing clothing, but even in a crop top, it fits well and is surprisingly comfortable! There are plenty of ways to adjust the harness so that it fits, and if you wanted to, just by flipping the waist part around, you can wear it "backwards" and still make it look cute!

It was a little tricky to put on at first but it feels so good to wear it can go with so many different outfits or even no clothing at all it's made of great quality and I can't wait to get more like it in the future.

When I got this, I had to stare at the photo on the listing so I'd know what I was looking at. It came all unbuckled so I had to do it all myself and fit it around my body.  I spent a good 10 minutes trying to figure out how to get this on my body and make it look like the girl in the photo. It took a long time but I eventually got it. This should really come with instructions. It's cute and feels good, it'll go great with my goth clothes!
Item exactly as described! It holds up, not flimsy and easy to put on once you understand the direction it goes in.
this is a really cool accessory and i can wear it over almost anything also its really comfortable and good quality, would get again

评论概述: Looks great and adjusts to multiple sizes
评论详情: I love this feaux leather body strap! I normally wear a size Xtra small and i'm about 5'2". There are multiple sizing options on the straps and buckles, so it should be able to fit multiple body types. It feels very comfortable and stays in place while i am wearing it. There is a slight chemical smell to the leather at first, but it isn't too strong of a smell. I wore it on top of a white shirt and i did see a tiny bit of staining on my shirt from the straps rubbing against the fabric. The metal ring on the back is a bit higher than i expeced and it sits around the base of my neck. The feaux leather feels like ok quality, though accessive bending of the straps may cause them to begin to crack and fall apart. Perfect for cosplay.
My daughter likes it, I don't get why LOL. But she is calling it good.

I'm 5foot 6in tall.  This harness at it's maximum length comes just below my rib cage.  Thankfully I can tighten the two lower belts a few notches and then my rib cage holds the harness in place.  If you are taller,  or have a large chest, it may be your breasts that hold this harness up......or take up so much of the slack that the lower waist strap is way up high right under your breasts.  This needs to be made bigger.  All it is are leather belts with buckles.  So there is no reason why it should be made so short.  Belts are adjustable.
